text.section: The board shall maintain the confidentiality of information relating to the licensee or applicant, except that the board may provide this information to local, state, or federal law enforcement agencies.
Upon inquiry by any individual or entity, the board or the board's administrative staff shall provide or confirm the license status of any private investigator or private investigating company.

law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 186, sec. 3, effective April 21, 2004. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 269, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2002.
